title: Fedora Linux KDE Spin Is Switching to the Calamares Graphical Installer
description:
Fedora Linux KDE Spin is switching to the Calamares graphical installer for its next release to enable native Wayland support and enable automatic keyboard layout selection on laptops.

The post Fedora Linux KDE Spin Is Switching to the Calamares Graphical Installer appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: DXVK 2.3 Improves Performance in Tomb Raider Anniversary and Fixes Many Bugs
description:
DXVK 2.3 Vulkan-based implementation of D3D9, D3D10, and D3D11 for Linux / Wine is now available for download with presentation improvements, configuration changes, and fixes for several games.

The post DXVK 2.3 Improves Performance in Tomb Raider Anniversary and Fixes Many Bugs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Linux Lite 6.6 Arrives with Support for 22 New Languages, New AI Helper Tool
description:
Linux Lite 6.6 distribution is now available for download based on Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS and powered by Linux kernel 5.15 LTS and Xfce 4.16. Here's what's new!

The post Linux Lite 6.6 Arrives with Support for 22 New Languages, New AI Helper Tool appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: fwupd 1.9.5 Released with Support for More Devices, Optional Passim Support
description:
fwupd 1.9.5 Linux firmware upgrading utility is now available for download with support for more devices and various improvements.
